title: Akasha Tap Takeover at The Goods Shed Wodonga
excerpt: On a special episode of Border Barrels, the boys head across the mighty Murray to the home of craft beer on the border, The Goods Shed, for their Akasha Tap Takeover event.

title: Murray Towns Brewing Co. Interview at The Woolhouse Albury
excerpt: A wonderful experience for the Border Barrels lads, as Jodie and Barry from Murray Towns Brewing Co. joined us for a relaxing Sunday afternoon session at The Woolhouse in Albury.
